<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>INVESCO HIGH INCOME TRUST II (the &#147;Fund&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY SOLICITED ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES (the &#147;Board&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY FOR THE JOINT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD SEPTEMBER&nbsp;8,&nbsp;2017</B></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>COMMON SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Common Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Common Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Common Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL BE
VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET FORTH
IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet,
please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY FOR THE JOINT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD SEPTEMBER&nbsp;8,&nbsp;2017</B></P></TD>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>COMMON SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Common Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Common Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Common Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL BE
VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET FORTH
IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet,
please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Common Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Common Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Common Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL BE
VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET FORTH
IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet,
please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>INVESCO MUNICIPAL OPPORTUNITY TRUST (the &#147;Fund&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY SOLICITED ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES (the &#147;Board&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY FOR THE JOINT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD SEPTEMBER&nbsp;8,&nbsp;2017</B></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>PREFERRED SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Preferred Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Preferred Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Preferred Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL
BE VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET
FORTH IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the
Internet, please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>INVESCO MUNICIPAL TRUST (the &#147;Fund&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY SOLICITED ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES (the &#147;Board&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY FOR THE JOINT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD SEPTEMBER&nbsp;8,&nbsp;2017</B></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>COMMON SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Common Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Common Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Common Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL BE
VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET FORTH
IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet,
please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>INVESCO MUNICIPAL TRUST (the &#147;Fund&#148;)</B></P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY FOR THE JOINT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD SEPTEMBER&nbsp;8,&nbsp;2017</B></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>PREFERRED SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Preferred Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Preferred Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Preferred Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL
BE VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET
FORTH IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the
Internet, please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY SOLICITED ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES (the &#147;Board&#148;)</B></P>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>COMMON SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Common Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Common Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Common Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL BE
VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET FORTH
IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet,
please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

Notice Regarding the Availability of Proxy Materials for the Joint Annual </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Meeting of Shareholders to Be Held on September 8, 2017 </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:11pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>The Proxy Statement for this meeting is available at:
<FONT STYLE="font-family:ARIAL" COLOR="#0000e1"><U>https://www.proxy-direct.com/inv-28909</U></FONT> </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:120pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Please detach at perforation before
mailing. </B></P> <P STYLE="margin-top:18pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:8pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>This proxy is solicited on behalf of the Board. The Board recommends voting &#147;FOR ALL&#148; of the nominees. </B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:12pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:48pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>Please detach at perforation before mailing. </B></P>
<P STYLE="font-size:18pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>INVESCO PENNSYLVANIA VALUE MUNICIPAL INCOME TRUST (the &#147;Fund&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY SOLICITED ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES (the &#147;Board&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY FOR THE JOINT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD SEPTEMBER&nbsp;8,&nbsp;2017</B></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>PREFERRED SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Preferred Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Preferred Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Preferred Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL
BE VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET
FORTH IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the
Internet, please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY FOR THE JOINT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD SEPTEMBER&nbsp;8,&nbsp;2017</B></P></TD>

<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>COMMON SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Common Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Common Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Common Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL BE
VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET FORTH
IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet,
please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Preferred Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Preferred Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Preferred Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL
BE VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET
FORTH IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the
Internet, please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>COMMON SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Common Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Common Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Common Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL BE
VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET FORTH
IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet,
please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>INVESCO SENIOR INCOME TRUST (the &#147;Fund&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY SOLICITED ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES (the &#147;Board&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY FOR THE JOINT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD SEPTEMBER&nbsp;8,&nbsp;2017</B></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>PREFERRED SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Preferred Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Preferred Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Preferred Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL
BE VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET
FORTH IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the
Internet, please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top" COLSPAN="15"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:9pt"><B>Authorized Signatures &#151; This section must be completed for your vote to be counted.&#151; Sign and Date
Below</B></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;&nbsp;</TD>

<TD VALIGN="top" COLSPAN="17"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:7pt">Please sign exactly as your name(s) appear(s) on this proxy card, and date it. When shares are held jointly, each holder
should sign. When signing as attorney, executor, administrator, trustee, officer of corporation or other entity or in another representative capacity, please give the full title under the signature.</P></TD></TR>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>COMMON SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Common Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Common Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Common Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL BE
VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET FORTH
IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet,
please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Preferred Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Preferred Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Preferred Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL
BE VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET
FORTH IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the
Internet, please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="middle" NOWRAP> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:8pt"><B>TO VOTE, MARK A BOX BELOW IN BLUE OR BLACK INK. EXAMPLE:</B></P></TD>

<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>INVESCO TRUST FOR INVESTMENT GRADE NEW YORK MUNICIPALS (the &#147;Fund&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY SOLICITED ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES (the &#147;Board&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY FOR THE JOINT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD SEPTEMBER&nbsp;8,&nbsp;2017</B></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>COMMON SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Common Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Common Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Common Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL BE
VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET FORTH
IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet,
please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="center"> <P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>INVESCO TRUST FOR INVESTMENT GRADE NEW YORK MUNICIPALS (the &#147;Fund&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY SOLICITED ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES (the &#147;Board&#148;)</B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:1pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="center"><B>PROXY FOR THE JOINT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS TO BE HELD SEPTEMBER&nbsp;8,&nbsp;2017</B></P></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top"></TD></TR>
</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>PREFERRED SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Preferred Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Preferred Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Preferred Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL
BE VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET
FORTH IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the
Internet, please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Common Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Common Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Common Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL BE
VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET FORTH
IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the Internet,
please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>

<TD VALIGN="top" ALIGN="right"><FONT STYLE="font-size:9pt">1a.</FONT></TD>
<TD VALIGN="bottom">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD VALIGN="top" COLSPAN="11"> <P ALIGN="justify" STYLE=" margin-top:0pt ; margin-bottom:0pt; font-family:ARIAL; font-size:9pt">Election of Trustees - The Board recommends a vote &#147;<U>FOR ALL</U>&#148; of the nominees listed:</P></TD>

</TABLE> <P STYLE="margin-top:6pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:10pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>PREFERRED SHARES </B></P>
<P STYLE="margin-top:0pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify">The undersigned holder of Preferred Shares of the Fund hereby revokes all previous proxies for his/her Preferred Shares of the Fund and appoints Philip A.
Taylor, John M. Zerr, Sheri S. Morris, Peter A. Davidson, Christopher B. Fischer, Odeh Stevens, Amanda M. Roberts, and Melanie Ringold, and any one of them separately, proxies with full power of substitution in each, and hereby authorizes them to
represent and to vote, as designated on the reverse of this proxy card, at the Joint Annual Meeting of Shareholders to be held at 1555 Peachtree Street, N.E., Atlanta, Georgia 30309 on September 8, 2017, at 1:00 p.m., Eastern Daylight Time, and at
any adjournment(s), postponement(s) or delay(s) thereof, all of the Preferred Shares of the Fund which the undersigned would be entitled to vote if personally present. <B>IF THIS PROXY IS SIGNED AND RETURNED WITH NO CHOICE INDICATED, THE SHARES WILL
BE VOTED &#147;FOR&#148; EACH OF THE NOMINEES AT THE DISCRETION OF THE PROXIES. PROXIES ARE AUTHORIZED TO VOTE, IN THEIR DISCRETION, UPON SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY PROPERLY COME BEFORE THE MEETING AND IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE VOTING STANDARDS SET
FORTH IN THE PROXY STATEMENT WITH RESPECT TO ANY ADJOURNMENT OR POSTPONEMENT OF THE MEETING.</B> </P> <P STYLE="margin-top:4pt; margin-bottom:0pt; font-size:9pt; font-family:ARIAL" ALIGN="justify"><B>NOTE: If you vote by telephone or on the
Internet, please do NOT return your proxy card. </B></P> <P STYLE="font-size:10pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt">&nbsp;</P>
